name: Holiday Hearts: A Very Merry Christmas Dating Sim
name_original: Holiday Hearts: A Very Merry Christmas Dating Sim
description:
Welcome to the town of Winterhaven, a small town where Christmas is the most magical time of the year. Will some of that magic include a little romance?

It's almost as if you're living in one of those holiday romance movies...

Just try not to be naughty this year.

🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄🎄

This game is intended to be a fun take on combining those Christmas holiday movies tropes and a dating sim / visual novel game! Hope you have a Very Merry Time!
